name: Skin Wisdom Ultimate Lift Wipes 25
usage: <Cooking_Instructions><Oven><Temperature F="" G="" C="" /></Oven><Microwave /><Barbeque /><Grill /><Shallow_Fry /><Deep_Fry /><Stir_Fry /><Steam /><Poach /><Hob /><Boil_In_The_Bag /><Oven_From_Frozen><Temperature F="" G="" C="" /></Oven_From_Frozen><Microwave_From_Frozen /></Cooking_Instructions><Directions>Use: Open lid and remove inner seal label. Remove a cleansing wipe and close lid immediately. Always remove eye make-up first by placing over closed eyes and gently sweeping downwards over the lashes. Follow by gently wiping across the face, neck and ears with light upward circular movements. Do not rinse. To get the best from your skin, use morning and evening followed by the Skin Wisdom Ultimate Lift Day or Night cream. Suitable for all skin types. Alcohol free and dermatologically tested. </Directions>
